item.title: Need help/ questions about signlink.java
item.dc:creator: @dexter_the_great dexter the great
item.description:
@dexter_the_great wrote:

Hello guys, im new to the community, i’ve looked through all the posts to help and aid with coding my very first delta 317 rsps. i have the ambition to make a webclient but i’m running into a few errors, any other time i had an error i would try to solve it but this is progressing to long lol, i apologize for being a “noob” but here is the errors im getting when compiling my signlink.java

signlink.java:37: error: illegal start of expression
public static final string findcachedir()
^
signlink.java:37: error: illegal start of expression
public static final string findcachedir()
^
signlink.java:37: error: ‘;’ expected
public static^final string findcachedir()

signlink.java:37: error ‘;’ expected
public static final string findcachedir^()

I’ve done everything up to the step in this tut where it says to edit the signlink: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=535370.0

i’m usingthe usa-pkz source and client, and i noticed two locations in there with a public static final cache dir. If anyone could help me over teamviewer i would greatly appreciate it.

Read full topic
